######################
# RaZ - Dependencies #
######################

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")

if (NOT RAZ_USE_EMSCRIPTEN)

    option(RAZ_USE_LIBPNG "Compile & use libpng" ON)
    if (RAZ_USE_LIBPNG)
        include(libpng)
    endif ()

    option(RAZ_USE_GLEW "Compile & use GLEW" ON)
    if (RAZ_USE_GLEW)
        include(GLEW)
    endif ()

    option(RAZ_USE_GLFW "Compile & use GLFW" ON)
    if (RAZ_USE_GLFW)
        include(GLFW)
    endif ()

    option(RAZ_USE_IMGUI "Compile & use ImGui" ON)
    if (RAZ_USE_IMGUI)
        include(ImGui)
    endif ()

else ()
    set(RAZ_USE_LIBPNG OFF)
    set(RAZ_USE_GLFW OFF)
    set(RAZ_USE_GLEW OFF)
    set(RAZ_USE_IMGUI ON)
endif ()
